Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is conflicting evidence regarding the date of the video.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video was shot on February 27, but there is evidence suggesting it was shot earlier.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the video was not shot during the riots but on February 24, as claimed by AAP spokesperson Deepak Bajpai.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video's EXIF data suggests it was shot on February 27, according to Facthunt founder Shashank Singh.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times due to the conflicting evidence and lack of clarity surrounding the date of the video.
